title: Berndes Spoon
description: Cooking has never been so easy! From steak tongs to glass lids, we offer a comprehensive and high-quality range of accessories and aids to ensure success at any task in the kitchen. This makes using BERNDES cookware even better.1 stainless steel/ nylon spoonCan be hung by hook at the end of handle for extra storage spaceGreat for indoor or outdoor cookingHand wash only
